Japanese Attempt to Land on Tok Islet
    Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- A right-wing organization of Japan is attempting to land on Tok Islet, claiming dominium over it, according to south Korean MBC.
 On May 4 four members of the organization staged a demonstration in waters off the islet after leaving Shimane Prefecture. Asserting that Tok Islet belongs to Japan, they blustered that they would attempt to land on the islet.    
 The south Korean maritime police corps dispatched five patrol craft, two helicopters and a commando force to the islet to guard it.
